ygData.subject: mistmoore faction
ygData.msgSnippet: want to raise MM faction REAL fast? do this: kill the real princess lenya in highkeep. the faction adjustment is humongous; after killing her only one time,
ygData.messageBody:
want to raise MM faction REAL fast? do this: kill the real princess lenya in
highkeep. the faction adjustment is humongous; after killing her only one
time, the faction seems to have maxed out (the second time i killed her, i
got no faction hit other than king tearis thex of felwithe). of course, the
equivalent high elf faction adjustments are equally large, but what do we
care about high elves anyway? :) i have yet to make a quick visit to
mistmoore to consider things, but i'll let you know what happens. oh,
becareful with lenya tho: when i attacked her, she immediately charmed me
(she cons green to me, how did she do dat?) and raced downstairs where she
raised havoc among the pickclaw killers. if you let her get loose too often,
you may build up a bad reputation with other players ;) summon up a pet:
even tho you will lose it when you get charmed, lenya wont run downstairs if
there is still something upstairs to attack.

by the way, did you know xicotl of mistmoore was a founding member of the
dismal rage of freeport? maybe he is an sk trainer.. or maybe he even gives
out a quest. hmm

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
